column5: Heard on Peterboro radio today that the OPP have recovered a bunch of fishing gear that was stolen from various places in the Coboconck area around the end of May.  If you had stuff stolen they ask that you contact the OPP
Thanks Lew for the info. Hopefully someone will get back there property.   Art

Yes I heard it on the Lindsay radio station too as well a few times today Lew !!!! Hmmm never heard of the opp doing a spot on the radio for fishing gear in the news !!! Must have been a large amount ?? Although 2 were arrested for it a 17 & 18 yr old !!!! I'm sure the people who lost it will get it back !!! I'm glad they got them too !!!!
http://www.mykawartha.com/news-story/4582784-two-charged-in-fishing-equipment-theft-investigation-kawartha-lakes-opp/  Three were identified but only two charged?
